```
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron ore mine and smelting setup at position (-21.0, -50.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position (-21.0, -50.0)
- Stone furnace at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Burner inserter at position (-16.5, -49.5) that puts fuel into the furnace
- Burner inserter at position (-18.5, -48.5) that extracts from the transport belt
- Burner inserter at position (-17.5, -46.5) that puts ore onto the transport belt
- Belt group at position (-17.5, -46.5) that connects the mining drill to the furnace

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing into a tile which is too far
- Ensure you are close enough to the tile before attempting to place an entity. The maximum distance is 10.

## NAMESPACE

### Variables
- inventory: Dict[str, int]
```
